attributes.action: Resurface the M20 between Junctions 8 and 9 to reduce noise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Highways Agency has reneged on previois undertakings to resurface the M20 between Junctions 8 and 9 to reduce noise levels which are of great concern to local residents who are also blighted by the Channel Tunnel Rail Link. M20 noise levels are above EC standards and are a health problem.
